detailed_results.test_name: L1.1 - General Journal uses ASSET01 FSG (overrides account FSG)
detailed_results.details: Document SA overrides account 400001's normal FSG

detailed_results.test_name: L1.2 - Cash Journal uses CASH01 FSG (overrides account FSG)
detailed_results.details: Document CA overrides account 400001's normal FSG

detailed_results.test_name: L1.3 - Customer Invoice uses RECV01 FSG (overrides account FSG)
detailed_results.details: Document DR overrides account 100010's normal FSG

detailed_results.test_name: L1.4 - ASSET01 validation (Business Unit OPT, Tax Code SUP)
detailed_results.details: ASSET01 should allow missing business unit and tax code

detailed_results.test_name: L2.1 - Revenue account uses REV01 FSG (no document override)
detailed_results.details: Account 400001 should inherit REV01 from its account group

detailed_results.test_name: L2.2 - Cash account uses CASH01 FSG (no document override)
detailed_results.details: Account 100010 should inherit CASH01 from its account group

detailed_results.test_name: L2.3 - REV01 validation (Business Unit, Tax Code, Business Area required)
detailed_results.details: Errors: ['Line 1: Business Unit is required (FSG: REQ)', 'Line 1: Business Area is required (FSG: REQ)', 'Line 1: Tax Code is required (FSG: REQ)']

detailed_results.test_name: L2.4 - CASH01 validation (Business Unit suppressed)
detailed_results.details: Should error on suppressed Business Unit: Line 1: Business Unit should not be provided (FSG: SUP - Suppressed)

detailed_results.test_name: L3.1 - All active account groups have default FSG
detailed_results.details: Groups with FSG: ['ACCR', 'CASH', 'COGS', 'EQTY', 'FINX', 'FXAS', 'INVA', 'INVT', 'LTDB', 'OCIE', 'OINC', 'OPEX', 'PAYB', 'PREP', 'RECV', 'RETE', 'SALE', 'STAT', 'STDB']

detailed_results.test_name: L3.2 - Account Group SALE maps to REV01
detailed_results.details: Group SALE should use REV01 as default FSG

detailed_results.test_name: L3.2 - Account Group CASH maps to CASH01
detailed_results.details: Group CASH should use CASH01 as default FSG

detailed_results.test_name: L3.2 - Account Group OPEX maps to EXP01
detailed_results.details: Group OPEX should use EXP01 as default FSG

detailed_results.test_name: L3.2 - Account Group COGS maps to COGS01
detailed_results.details: Group COGS should use COGS01 as default FSG

detailed_results.test_name: ST.1 - REQ field validation (missing required field)
detailed_results.details: Should fail with Business Unit required error

detailed_results.test_name: ST.2 - SUP field validation (provided suppressed field)
detailed_results.details: Should fail with suppression error

detailed_results.test_name: ST.3 - OPT field validation (optional field not provided)
detailed_results.details: Optional fields should not cause validation errors

detailed_results.test_name: RW.1 - Complete Sales Invoice Entry
detailed_results.actual: Debit: False, Credit: False, Total errors: 5
detailed_results.details: Sales invoice should pass all validations

detailed_results.test_name: RW.2 - Cash Receipt Entry
detailed_results.details: Cash entries should have minimal field requirements

detailed_results.test_name: RW.3 - Expense Entry Missing Required Fields
detailed_results.details: Expense accounts should require business unit and area

detailed_results.test_name: E.1 - Invalid GL Account handling
detailed_results.details: Should gracefully handle non-existent accounts

detailed_results.test_name: E.2 - Invalid Document Type handling
detailed_results.details: Should fallback to account FSG when document type not found

detailed_results.test_name: E.3 - Empty field value handling
detailed_results.details: Empty strings and whitespace should be treated as missing

detailed_results.test_name: P.1 - FSG Cache Performance (100 lookups)
detailed_results.details: Cached lookups should be very fast

detailed_results.test_name: P.2 - Validation Performance (100 validations)
detailed_results.details: Validation should be fast enough for real-time use
